sentences.en: Arbitrary arrests and detention without trial were common.
sentences.cn: 随意逮捕和拘留屡见不鲜。

sentences.en: Exactly where these points are chosen is arbitrary.
sentences.cn: 这些点具体选在哪里,可由我们自定.
他做的决定难以预料, 主观武断.

sentences.en: He thought that the Army's arbitrary rejection of the people was unwarranted.
sentences.cn: 他认为陆军不分清红皂白把这些人关在门外未免不讲道理.

sentences.en: How shallow were the arbitrary definitions of ordinary psychologists!
sentences.cn: 一般心理学家那些任意下的定义多浅薄啊!

sentences.en: She gave up all idea of any arbitrary division of her guests.
sentences.cn: 她放弃了对客人们武断地作出任何划分的念头.

sentences.en: Such resistance categories are arbitrary and vaguely delineted.
sentences.cn: 这些对抗种类的描述是主观的和含糊不清的.

sentences.en: The actual dial can have a quite arbitrary shape.
sentences.cn: 实际的度盘可有各种形状.

sentences.en: the arbitrary arrests of political opponents
The choice of players for the team seemed completely arbitrary.
sentences.cn: 看来这个队的队员完全是随意选定的。

sentences.en: The empirical relations are quite arbitrary and sometimes inadequate.
sentences.cn: 经验的关系式完全是人为的,有时是不适当的.

sentences.en: The impression was being created that all arrests were arbitrary.
sentences.cn: 人们得到的印象是,所有的犯人全是滥捕的.

sentences.en: The value placed on these factors is therefore somewhat arbitrary.
sentences.cn: 对这些因素的评价多少是有些任意性的.

sentences.en: This arbitrary use of power wasn't merely a character flaw.
sentences.cn: 这种专横独断并不是(他)性格上的瑕疵.

sentences.en: You can make an arbitrary choice.

words.tran_cn: 武断地；反复无常地；专横地

trans.tran_en: decided or arranged without any reason or plan, often unfairly
